name: Human Tested
description:
A crazy physics-based game that shows you the other side of the life of crash test dummies.

The track is full of unexpected traps and rivals are ready to take your workplace away from you. Mistakes have real consequences. Try to reach the finish line while keeping some parts of your body and you will be given a chance to test a new car.

  The gameplay is intuitive - all you need to do is tap at the phone screen to move your doll. However, can you avoid all the deadly traps people have prepared for you?   

Feeling like car testing is too simple? Would you say the same about a plane, rocket, or boat? Upgrade your armor as you progress, participate in harder challenges and you will be given an opportunity to test those!

Will you be able to pass the crash test?
